title: I work in Kent, husband works in Bangor. Where should we live?
text:
I recently got hired in Kent and my husband is active duty NAVY working in Bangor. We are moving to WA in June. 

What is a good middle ground location for us to live? Open to using the ferry system but nervous about availability/reliability.  

Other considerations are that my husband will be deployed 6 month out of the year and we have a child in daycare. 

Anything else we should consider?
